summary: Through 2024, the U.S. and other donors were providing funds to help Ukraine start recovering from the devastating economic and social consequences of Russia's 2022 invasion. Early recovery efforts are aimed at improving governance and the economy and advancing Ukraine's integration into the European Union. The State Department led U.S. agencies in planning for these assistance efforts. But State hasn't estimated costs for achieving early...
title: Ukraine: State Should Take Additional Actions to Improve Planning for Any Future Recovery Assistance
